schema.name: Position_in_organization_arm
schema.description: The definition of a position in an organization and the relationships between positions and organizations.

type.name: person_or_organization_or_person_in_organization_select
type.description: The person, organization or person in organization select provides a mechanism to allow either a person or an organization or a person in an organization to hold a position.

entity.name: Person_or_organization_or_person_in_organization_in_position
entity.description:
A person, organization or person in organization may hold more than one position within an organization or organizations.
A person can hold two positions in an organization: Production Manager and Safety Officier.
A position in an organization can be held by more than one person or organization.
Two people can hold the same position in a job-share scheme.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the person or organization in the position.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the person or organization in position is known.

explicit.name: person_or_organization
explicit.description: The person or organization who holds the position.

explicit.name: position
explicit.description: The position that is held by the person or organization.

entity.name: Person_or_organization_or_person_in_organization_in_position_relationship
entity.description: Examples of the relationship are successor job-share The meaning of the relationship is determined by classification

explicit.name: related
explicit.description: The child person, organization or person in organization in position of the relationship.

explicit.name: relating
explicit.description: The parent person, organization or person in organization in position of the relationship.

entity.name: Position
entity.description:
A position is a function or job performed by a person. It defines responsibilities and activities. A position that is not fulfilled by a person is a vacancy.
Company Director
Service Engineer

explicit.name: address
explicit.description: The address of the position.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the position.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the position is known.

explicit.name: position_context
explicit.description: The position that is used by the organization.

entity.name: Position_assignment
entity.description: A position_assignment is an association of an position with activity or product data.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: The activity or product data to which the position is assigned

explicit.name: position
explicit.description: The position that is to be associated with the activity or product data.

explicit.name: role
explicit.description: The role in which the position is operating with respect to the activity or product data

entity.name: Position_group
entity.description:
A group collecting people in their positions to cooperate in an assignment.
People representing utility companies who cooperate with each other to coordinate road works.

explicit.name: description
